${modID}:SAVE_ME_HANNAH.NAME: Save Me Hannah!
${modID}:SAVE_ME_HANNAH.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, gain !M! Block (lil kiss<3). NL ${modID}:Performance 1.

${modID}:SUGAR_GLIDE.NAME: Sugar Glide!
${modID}:SUGAR_GLIDE.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Deal !D! damage, or NL Draw !M! Cards.

${modID}:CUM_GANG_CARD.NAME: Cum Gang!
${modID}:CUM_GANG_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. Draw 1 card. NL Repeat for every 2 Cum Gang cards played this combat.

${modID}:TAKING_SECONDS_CARD.NAME: Taking Seconds
${modID}:TAKING_SECONDS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Your ${modID}:Choose_One cards allow you to pick 1 extra option.

${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_CARD.NAME: CMR Gang!
${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL For each Clothed Mole Rat Gang card played this combat apply a random debuff to the enemy.
${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL For each Clothed Mole Rat Gang card played this combat randomly either apply a random debuff to the enemy or random buff to yourself.

${modID}:MILF_GANG_CARD.NAME: MILF Gang!
${modID}:MILF_GANG_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase by !M! for each MILF Gang card played this combat

${modID}:CLAW_GANG_CARD.NAME: Claw Gang!
${modID}:CLAW_GANG_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increases by 2 for each Claw Gang card played this combat. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.
${modID}:CLAW_GANG_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increases by 2 for each Claw Gang card played this combat. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:GANG_UP_CARD.NAME: Gang Up
${modID}:GANG_UP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Return 1 card from each gang, or all cards from 1 gang to your hand from your discard pile

${modID}:GANG_UP_ONE_GANG_OPTION.NAME: One Gang
${modID}:GANG_UP_ONE_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL cards from one gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:GANG_UP_CLAW_GANG_OPTION.NAME: Claw Gang
${modID}:GANG_UP_CLAW_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL cards from Claw Gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:GANG_UP_MILF_GANG_OPTION.NAME: MILF Gang
${modID}:GANG_UP_MILF_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL cards from MILF Gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:GANG_UP_CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_O.NAME: CMR Gang
${modID}:GANG_UP_CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_O.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL cards from Clothed Mole Rat Gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:GANG_UP_CUM_GANG_OPTION.NAME: Cum Gang
${modID}:GANG_UP_CUM_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Return ALL cards from Cum Gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:GANG_UP_ALL_GANGS_OPTION.NAME: All Gangs
${modID}:GANG_UP_ALL_GANGS_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Return 1 Card from each gang to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:MILF_GANG_SLAM_CARD.NAME: MILF Gang Slam!
${modID}:MILF_GANG_SLAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal damage equal to your current Block. This card's damage is also increased by Dexterity.

${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_SLAM_CARD.NAME: CMR Gang Slam!
${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_SLAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Play NL Clothed Mole Rat Gang! NL on each enemy.
${modID}:CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_GANG_SLAM_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play NL Clothed Mole Rat Gang!+ NL on each enemy.

${modID}:CUM_GANG_SLAM_CARD.NAME: Cum Gang Slam!
${modID}:CUM_GANG_SLAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !M! damage.  Damage is equal to the number of cards played this turn plus your current hand size.
${modID}:CUM_GANG_SLAM_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !M! damage.  Damage is equal to twice the number of cards played this turn plus your current hand size.

${modID}:GANG_GANG_CARD.NAME: Gang Gang!
${modID}:GANG_GANG_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Progress all gangs by 1.

${modID}:FIND_A_FRIEND_CARD.NAME: Find a Friend
${modID}:FIND_A_FRIEND_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! gang card(s) from your draw pile.

${modID}:POWER_OF_FRIENDSHIP_CARD.NAME:
Power Of
Friendship!
${modID}:POWER_OF_FRIENDSHIP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy for each gang card in your hand.

${modID}:GANG_LEADER_CARD.NAME: Gang Leader
${modID}:GANG_LEADER_CARD.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn progress all gangs by !M!.

${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CLAW_GANG_OPTION.NAME: Claw Gang
${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CLAW_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not Claw Gang.

${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_MILF_GANG_OPTION.NAME: MILF Gang
${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_MILF_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not MILF Gang.

${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_G.NAME: CMR Gang
${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CLOTHED_MOLE_RAT_G.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not Clothed Mole Rat Gang.

${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CUM_GANG_OPTION.NAME: Cum Gang
${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CUM_GANG_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not Claw Gang.

${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CARD.NAME: Gang Loyalty
${modID}:GANG_LOYALTY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Select a gang and Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not of that Gang.

${modID}:GANG_SHEEP_CARD.NAME: Gang Sheep
${modID}:GANG_SHEEP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a gang card, return this to your hand from your discard pile.

${modID}:INFIGHTING_CARD.NAME: Infighting
${modID}:INFIGHTING_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Discard all gang cards in your hand. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

${modID}:GANG_INFLUENCE_CARD.NAME: Gang Influence
${modID}:GANG_INFLUENCE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ${modID}:Subscriber for every !M! gang cards played this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GANG_LORD_CARD.NAME: Gang Lord
${modID}:GANG_LORD_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you progress a Gang, progress them by !M! more.

${modID}:JOINING_FORCES_CARD.NAME: Joining Forces!
${modID}:JOINING_FORCES_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ALL gangs are progressed by any Gang card played this turn.

${modID}:GANG_GANG_SLAM_CARD.NAME: Gang Gang Slam!
${modID}:GANG_GANG_SLAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gang_Card. NL Add an ethereal copy of each slam card to your hand, they cost 0 and exhaust this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cards are added in this order:
Cum Gang Slam!, MILF Gang Slam!, Clothed Mole Rat Gang Slam!
If your hand is too big extra cards are lost.

${modID}:PLAYING_CATCH_UP_CARD.NAME: Playing Catch Up
${modID}:PLAYING_CATCH_UP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Progress your least progressed gang by !M!. Gangs must be at at least 1 to be affected. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GO_BUGS_CARD.NAME: Go Bugs!
${modID}:GO_BUGS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:GO_BABY_CARD.NAME: Go Baby!
${modID}:GO_BABY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Give ALL enemies - !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BUNNY_TAG_TEAM_CARD.NAME: Bunny Tag Team!
${modID}:BUNNY_TAG_TEAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Deal !D! damage, or gain !B! Block and draw !M! Card.

${modID}:BUNS_BEAUTY_CARD.NAME: Bun's Beauty
${modID}:BUNS_BEAUTY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL To ALL Enemies: NL If the enemy plans to attack, apply !M! weak, otherwise apply !M! vulnerable. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:BEVINS_BASH_CARD.NAME: Bevin's Bash
${modID}:BEVINS_BASH_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable to an enemy.

${modID}:YEP_CARD.NAME: YEP!
${modID}:YEP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if you took damage this combat, do it again. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:BEVIN_BOUNCE_CARD.NAME: Bevin Bounce!
${modID}:BEVIN_BOUNCE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy twice.

${modID}:BLADE_CRONCH_CARD.NAME: Blade CRONCH!
${modID}:BLADE_CRONCH_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, do it again.

${modID}:COCKROACH_CRUNCH_CARD.NAME: Cockroach Crunch!
${modID}:COCKROACH_CRUNCH_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL If that would bring them to !M! hp or below, kill them.

${modID}:HARDY_HOWL_CARD.NAME: Hardy Howl!
${modID}:HARDY_HOWL_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Apply 2 weak to all enemies, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${modID}:HAMPTER_HIDE_CARD.NAME: Hampter Hide!
${modID}:HAMPTER_HIDE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL After the first instance of unblocked damage on the next !M! turn(s) gain 1 intangible.

${modID}:HARDY_BOY_STOMP_CARD.NAME: Hardy Boy Stomp!
${modID}:HARDY_BOY_STOMP_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable, or deal !B! damage.

${modID}:SLAY_THE_STREAMER_CARD.NAME: Slay The Streamer
${modID}:SLAY_THE_STREAMER_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Give yourself -X Dexterity NL Gain X ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.
${modID}:SLAY_THE_STREAMER_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give yourself -X Dexterity NL Gain X + 1 ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:GLIDER_TAG_TEAM_CARD.NAME: Glider Tag Team
${modID}:GLIDER_TAG_TEAM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Deal !D! Damage, or give an enemy !M! Strength.

${modID}:HAMPTER_IN_THE_SHADOWS_CARD.NAME: Shadow Hampter
${modID}:HAMPTER_IN_THE_SHADOWS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Deal !D! damage, if the enemy is below 50% HP, deal !D! damage 2 more times.

${modID}:THEY_CAME_FOR_THE_PETS_CARD.NAME:
They Came For
The Pets
${modID}:THEY_CAME_FOR_THE_PETS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Whenever you play an Animal Card this turn, gain 1 ${modID}:Follower. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:LIVING_IN_A_ZOO_CARD.NAME: Living In a Zoo
${modID}:LIVING_IN_A_ZOO_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Draw !M! Cards, discard any that are not Animal Cards.

${modID}:ILL_GIVE_YOU_A_TREAT_CARD.NAME: I'll Give you a Treat
${modID}:ILL_GIVE_YOU_A_TREAT_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL Your next animal card this turn plays twice.

${modID}:PETS_ARE_THEIR_OWN_REWARD_CARD.NAME:
Pets Are Their
Own Reward
${modID}:PETS_ARE_THEIR_OWN_REWARD_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ALL Animal Cards cost !M! less to play this combat.

${modID}:TASTE_THE_WILD_CARD.NAME: Taste the Wild
${modID}:TASTE_THE_WILD_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Animal_Card. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies, or reduce the cost of ALL Animal Cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

${modID}:TASTE_THE_WILD_FORM_A_PACK_OPTI.NAME: Form a Pack
${modID}:TASTE_THE_WILD_FORM_A_PACK_OPTI.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of ALL Animal Cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

${modID}:END_OF_STREAM_FATIGUE_CARD.NAME: Stream End Fatigue
${modID}:END_OF_STREAM_FATIGUE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Give yourself -X Strength, gain X ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.
${modID}:END_OF_STREAM_FATIGUE_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give yourself -X Strength NL Gain X + 1 ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:GET_EM_BOYS_CARD.NAME: Get 'em Boys!
${modID}:GET_EM_BOYS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, repeat for every !M! ${modID}:Followers.

${modID}:MOB_MENTALITY_CARD.NAME: Mob Mentality
${modID}:MOB_MENTALITY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to half your ${modID}:Follower Count (Miniumum 1).

${modID}:CROWDFUNDED_CARD.NAME: Crowdfunded
${modID}:CROWDFUNDED_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain Gold equal to 1 third your ${modID}:Follower Count (Miniumum 1). NL Exhaust
${modID}:CROWDFUNDED_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Gold equal to half your ${modID}:Follower Count (Miniumum 1). NL Exhaust

${modID}:GREEDY_STREAMER_CARD.NAME: Greedy Streamer
${modID}:GREEDY_STREAMER_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: Draw !M! cards, or lose 1 ${modID}:Subscriber and draw 2 extra cards.

${modID}:SELLOUT_TO_CHAT_CARD.NAME: Sellout to Chat
${modID}:SELLOUT_TO_CHAT_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Take 4 Damage NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Gain !M! Gold, or Gain 3 ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 1. NL Exhaust
${modID}:SELLOUT_TO_CHAT_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 6 Damage NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Gain !M! Gold, or Gain 5 ${modID}:Subscribers. NL ${modID}:Performance 1. NL Exhaust

${modID}:STRENGTH_IN_NUMBERS_CARD.NAME:
Strength In
Numbers
${modID}:STRENGTH_IN_NUMBERS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a Subscriber, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:I_DONT_NEED_EM_CARD.NAME: I Don't Need 'em
${modID}:I_DONT_NEED_EM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose a Subscriber, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:AGGRESSIVE_AUDIENCE_CARD.NAME: Aggressive Audience
${modID}:AGGRESSIVE_AUDIENCE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a ${modID}:Subscriber or ${modID}:Follower, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:SPONSERED_BY_RAID_SHADOW_LEGEND.NAME:
Sponsered by Raid
Shadow Legends
${modID}:SPONSERED_BY_RAID_SHADOW_LEGEND.DESCRIPTION: If you are a streamer, when this card is added to your deck, gain !M! gold. NL This cannot be removed from your deck. NL Ethereal, Unplayable

${modID}:STREAM_RAID_CARD.NAME: Stream Raid
${modID}:STREAM_RAID_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage equal to half your ${modID}:Followers. NL ${modID}:Performance 2.

${modID}:DISPOSABLE_ASSETS_SACRIFICE_OPT.NAME: Sacrifice
${modID}:DISPOSABLE_ASSETS_SACRIFICE_OPT.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to 3 random enemies and lose 3 ${modID}:Subscribers.

${modID}:DISPOSABLE_ASSETS_CARD.NAME: Disposable Assets
${modID}:DISPOSABLE_ASSETS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: Deal !D! damage to 3 random enemies and lose 3 ${modID}:Subscribers, or Gain !B! Block and gain 2 ${modID}:Subscribers. NL Exhaust

${modID}:MULLIGAN_CARD.NAME: Mulligan
${modID}:MULLIGAN_CARD.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, choose to either keep your hand, or discard it and Draw 5 new cards.

${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_CARD.NAME: Eldritch Blast
${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Choose_One if Fatal effect: NL Recieve and extra Card Reward, NL Recieve an extra Gold Reward, NL Recieve an extra Potion Reward. NL ${modID}:Performance 2. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_CARD_OPTION.NAME: Get Options
${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_CARD_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, recieve an extra Card Reward. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_GOLD_OPTION.NAME: Get Greedy
${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_GOLD_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, recieve an extra Gold Reward. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_POTION_OPTION.NAME: Get Tipsy
${modID}:ELDRITCH_BLAST_POTION_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, recieve an extra Potion Reward. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:JEFF_BEZOS_CARD.NAME: Jeff Bezos
${modID}:JEFF_BEZOS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Subscribe with Twitch Prime Cards to your hand. NL Exhaust

${modID}:FUELED_BY_CHAT_CARD.NAME: Fueled By Chat
${modID}:FUELED_BY_CHAT_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity for every !M! ${modID}:Followers you have (Rounded down).

${modID}:DOES_FROST_PRIME_HAVE_LETHAL_CA.NAME: Frost Has Lethal?
${modID}:DOES_FROST_PRIME_HAVE_LETHAL_CA.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Subscribers NL Die next turn. NL ${modID}:Performance 4. NL Exhaust

${modID}:ANDREW_CARD.NAME: ANDREW!
${modID}:ANDREW_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Performance 3.

${modID}:BIG_BRAIN_PLAYS_CARD.NAME: Big Brain Plays
${modID}:BIG_BRAIN_PLAYS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Gain !M! Metallicize, or gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:BUSTIN_MAKES_ME_FEEL_GOOD_CARD.NAME:
Bustin Makes Me
Feel Good
${modID}:BUSTIN_MAKES_ME_FEEL_GOOD_CARD.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, if you have no block, Bust (Heal !M! HP).

${modID}:POCKET_BRIMSTONE_CARD.NAME: Pocket Brimstone
${modID}:POCKET_BRIMSTONE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, give all enemies 1 Strength.

${modID}:POCKET_BRIMSTONES_LESS_ANGRY_CO.NAME:
Pocket Brimstone's
Less Angry Cousin
${modID}:POCKET_BRIMSTONES_LESS_ANGRY_CO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity, give all enemies 1 Metallicize.

${modID}:LETS_DO_THAT_AGAIN_CARD.NAME: Let's Do That Again
${modID}:LETS_DO_THAT_AGAIN_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Draw Pile and your Discard Pile.

${modID}:HUMAN_SHIELD_CARD.NAME: Human Shield
${modID}:HUMAN_SHIELD_CARD.DESCRIPTION: If you would take unblocked attack damage this turn, prevent it and lose that many ${modID}:Followers. Only works up to your ${modID}:Follower count.

${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_CARD.NAME: Ascended Form
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Play Demon Form, Wraith Form, Echo Form, or Deva Form.
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_CARD.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Choose_One: NL Play Demon Form, Wraith Form, Echo Form, or Deva Form.

${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_DEMON_FORM_OPTION.NAME: Demon Form
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_DEMON_FORM_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength. NL ${modID}:Performance 4.

${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_WRAITH_FORM_OPTIO.NAME: Wraith Form
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_WRAITH_FORM_OPTIO.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_ECHO_FORM_OPTION.NAME: Echo Form
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_ECHO_FORM_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice.
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_ECHO_FORM_OPTION.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.

${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_DEVA_FORM_OPTION.NAME: Deva Form
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_DEVA_FORM_OPTION.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and increase this gain by 1.
${modID}:ASCENDED_FORM_DEVA_FORM_OPTION.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and increase this gain by 1.

${modID}:MASTER_OF_SYNERGIES_CARD.NAME: Master of Synergies
${modID}:MASTER_OF_SYNERGIES_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to 1/4 your ${modID}:Follower count. NL Gain 1 ${modID}:Subscriber for each Gang card played this combat. NL Gain 5 Block for each Animal Card in your hand. NL ${modID}:Performance 4. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.
